attributes.action: put pressure on Wirral Borough Council to re-open Tranmere Air Raid Shelters as a major tourist attraction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Completed in 1942, the Tranmere Air Raid Shelters contain 125 miles of passageways, 8 feet high and 8 feet 6 inches wide. The shelters were fully equipped with gas, electricity, running water and toilets. There was even a canteen and a library!. There is enough room to accomadate 6000 people.
We would like these tunnels restored and re-opened to the public as a major tourist attraction, similiar to the one in Stockport.
